trans-unit.source: Cable your StorSimple 8100 for power | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Cable your StorSimple 8100 for power | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Explains how to attach the power cables and then turn on a StorSimple 8100 device for the first time.
trans-unit.target: Explains how to attach the power cables and then turn on a StorSimple 8100 device for the first time.

trans-unit.source: Make sure that the power switches on each of the Power and Cooling Modules (PCMs) are in the OFF position.
trans-unit.target: Make sure that the power switches on each of the Power and Cooling Modules (PCMs) are in the OFF position.

trans-unit.source: Connect the power cords to each of the PCMs in the primary enclosure.
trans-unit.target: Connect the power cords to each of the PCMs in the primary enclosure.

trans-unit.source: Attach the power cords to the rack power distribution units (PDUs) as shown in the following image.
trans-unit.target: Attach the power cords to the rack power distribution units (PDUs) as shown in the following image.

trans-unit.source: Make sure that the two PCMs use separate power sources.
trans-unit.target: Make sure that the two PCMs use separate power sources.

trans-unit.source: To ensure high availability for your system, we recommend that you strictly adhere to the power cabling scheme shown in the following diagram.
trans-unit.target: To ensure high availability for your system, we recommend that you strictly adhere to the power cabling scheme shown in the following diagram.

trans-unit.source: To turn on the system, flip the power switches on both PCMs to the ON position.
trans-unit.target: To turn on the system, flip the power switches on both PCMs to the ON position.
